articles.title: Competition Bureau obtains court order for investigation into Google’s ad practices
articles.description: The Competition Bureau says in a press release it’s investigating whether Google has engaged in practices that harm competition
articles.content:
The Competition Bureau says it’s obtained a court order in an ongoing investigation into Google’s advertising practices in Canada.
The order requires Google to produce records and written information relevant to the investigation.

articles.title: Competition Bureau gets court order for investigation into Google's ad practices
